quiz.question: In which year was the United Nations founded?
Which year did the Statute of Westminster grant legislative independence to British Dominions?
In what year did the Pilgrims land at Plymouth Rock and establish Plymouth Colony?
In which year did Napoleon Bonaparte become Emperor of the French?
Which year saw the formation of NATO as a collective defense alliance?
When was the Rosetta Stone engraved, enabling the decipherment of Egyptian hieroglyphs after discovery?
In what year did Gandhi lead the Salt March against British salt taxes?
When was the Edict of Nantes, granting religious toleration in France, issued?
Which year did Ferdinand Magellan's expedition begin the first circumnavigation of the globe?
In which year did World War I begin?
In what year did the Panama Canal officially open for traffic?
When did the Dutch capture Malacca from the Portuguese, altering Southeast Asian trade control?
What year did the United States declare independence?
In which year did the Cuban Missile Crisis bring the world close to nuclear war?
Which year did the Battle of Tours (Poitiers) take place where Charles Martel halted Islamic expansion?
